definition: Shanghai Incident of 28th January 1932, Chinese uprising against Japanese quarters of Shanghai

sentences.english: The courtyard of the National 228 Memorial Museum.
sentences.chinese: 二二八國家紀念館庭院廣場。

sentences.english: And it helped arrange a national election in nineteen twenty-eight.
sentences.chinese: 它幫助安排在一九二八年全國大選。

sentences.english: Dr. Fleming's discovery of penicillin occurred in 1928.
sentences.chinese: 弗萊明醫生髮現青黴素是在一九二八年。

sentences.english: In game nine, the bobbin bar mahjong two eight.
sentences.chinese: 合玩牌九，筒子槓麻將二八槓等。

sentences.english: He also fixed the tropical years at 365.2428 days.
sentences.chinese: 他還固定的熱帶歲三百六十五點二四二八天。

sentences.english: After Japan enkindled flames of war on January 28th in Shanghai, this inclination was shown more distinctively.
sentences.chinese: 一二八戰火點燃後，這種傾向更鮮明地表露出來。

sentences.english: The Pareto law - principle or 80/20 - is extremely useful in many areas.
sentences.chinese: 巴萊多定律或者稱二八定律在許多方面都非常有用。

sentences.english: Within this, prioritize life. What is required of me?
sentences.chinese: 用二八法則來區分生活的優先級。

sentences.english: The mere fact of applying the principle of 80/20 can make very positive changes in your life.
sentences.chinese: 輕鬆一試，二八定律便會給生活帶來非常積極的變化。

sentences.english: Acts 28:12 And having landed at Syracuse , we remained three days.
sentences.chinese: 徒二八12到了敘拉古，我們停泊三日。

definition: (of a girl) in the prime of youth
to manage to sell/to dispose of sth (by selling)/to get property off one's hands/to find excuses (to get off a charge)/to extricate sb (from trouble)/to vindicate/to become prettier (of child)
market price/quotation of market price/the current market situation
as a lotus flower breaking the surface (idiom); surpassingly beautiful (of young lady's face or old gentleman's calligraphy)
middle-aged but still attractive woman/lady of a certain age
Zhangyang county in Lüliang 呂梁|吕梁[Lu:3 liang2], Shanxi 山西
a girl's teenage years (idiom); maidenhood/a budding beauty
middle-aged but still attractive woman/lady of a certain age
